name: Delta Smartphone Caddy II
categories: Mounts and sensors for bike computers
description: Keep your phone accessible as you ride. This holder mounts on your handlebars or stem and adjusts to your preferred viewing angle. Rubber bumpers hold your phone securely, cushion it against jolts, and allow quick removal at your destination.Securely holds most smartphones with a 4.7 in. screen, with dimensions up to 74 x 16 x 139mm.Does not work with Otterbox® or similar large cases.Works with road and commuter bikes.Handlebar and stem mounts included.Includes all-weather water-resistant bag.
